name: Elaphe Propulsion Technologies
goal: Elaphe Propulsion Technologies Ltd is focused on research and development of in-wheel motors, which are one of the disruptive technologies opening a whole new field of possibilities and opportunities to revolutionize the car concept of the 21st century. Elaphe’s patented electromagnetic topology is the kind of fundamental innovation which enables design and manufacture of extremely compact, lightweight and supremely powerful direct-drive in-wheel powertrain that uses no transmission, leaves plenty of space on the chassis for passengers and batteries, and increases safety on the road by utilizing advanced torque vectoring methods. Elaphe's patented disruptive technology is bringing huge improvements in energy efficiency can significantly contribute to the reduction of global emissions and use of raw materials while at the same time making vehicles safer and smarter. Elaphe's goal is to showcase the benefits of high-tech smart distributed propulsion systems and promote their use in passenger and other vehicles whilst working with customers and authorities on shaping the future, greener world.
interests: Business and Industry, Environment, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Transport
